profile.title: Mbiri yeMushandisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Hakuna kiyi yakavanzika pachiishandiso ichi yekuendesa kunze.
profile.importFailed: Kutadza kupinza kiyi (pasiwedhi isiriyo kana faira rakanganisika).
profile.keysRotated: Makiyi matsva agadzirwa uye kiyi yeruzhinji yaiswa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kiyi yako yakavanzika haimboendi kunze kwechishandiso ichi. Tumira kopi yakavharidzirwa kuti uidzorere pane chimwe chishandiso.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri paFree‚Äîshandisa Sun/Moon pazasi nekukurumidza. Kwidza kuti uvhure madingindira akawanda.
profile.backupDesc: Gadzira mabekapu akavharidzirwa emakiyi, wozodzoreredza pane chimwe chishandiso kuti uenderanise.
profile.followHint: Nyaya dzavo dzichaonekwa muFollowing kana vakatumira kune Vateveri (kana Veruzhinji).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Pane chatiitika chisina kunaka muchikamu ichi.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tumira mafoni nemeseji anopinda kunhamba yako kana email yakasimbiswa. Kubuda, mafoni/meseji anogona kuratidza nhamba yako yeChatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Sarudza kanenge kumwe kunoenda (foni kana email).
profile.errQuietHours: Maawa ekunyarara anofanira kuva pakati pe0 ne23.

support.heading: Tingakubatsire sei?
support.contactIntro: Tichakutumira mhinduro neemail. Sanganisira ruzivo kuti tigone kudzokorora dambudziko.
support.sendError: Haina kutumira. Nyorera support@chatforia.com panzvimbo pezvo.

chat.selectPrompt: Sarudza meseji kana imba yekutaura kuti utange

premium.heading: Kwidza kuPremium
premium.description: Vhura maficha ane simba & bvisa zviziviso.

auth.headline: Kutumirana kwakachengeteka, kwepasi rose nekududzira ipapo ipapo
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, dudziro inofambiswa neAI, mameseji anonyangarika, uye kufona nezwi/vhidhiyo.

feature.privacy: Zvakavanzika pamberi. Data rako, kutonga kwako.

hero.sub: End-to-end encryption, dudziro inofambiswa neAI, mameseji anonyangarika, uye kufona nezwi/vhidhiyo.

feat.privacy: Zvakavanzika pamberi. Data rako, kutonga kwako.

auth.desktopTip: Uri padaesktop? Scana nefone kuti utore app.
auth.scanHelper: Uri padaesktop? Scana nefone kuti utore app.
auth.subhead: Kuvanzika, kwakavharidzirwa, uye kududzirwa ‚Äî ipapo ipapo.
auth.tip: Zano: Shandisa akaunti imwe chete pawebhu nepa mobile. Mameseji ako anoramba aenderana.
auth.scanHint: Scana kuti utore app kana kuvhura mubhurawuza.

press.title: Press
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ishini yekutumirana mameseji inotanga nezvakavanzika inofambisa hurukuro dze mitauro yakasiyana nyore. Mameseji anovharidzirwa kubva pakutanga, uye dudziro yakavakirwa-mukati inotsigira mitauro 100+ munguva chaiyo. Vashandisi vanogona kubatidza mameseji anonyangarika, kusiya zviratidzo zvekuti zvaverengwa zvasarudzika, uye kuenderanisa pamidziyo. Iripo pa iOS, Android, nepawebhu.
press.scanTip: Uri padaesktop? Scana nefone kuti utore app.

careers.title: Mabasa
careers.intro: Tiri chikwata chidiki chiri kuvaka mushandirapamwe wakachengeteka, wepasi rose. Kana uchida encryption, kuwanika, uye UX inofadza, tinoda kunzwa kubva kwauri.
careers.openRoles: Mabasa aripo: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Chigadzirwa, Rubatsiro.

about.title: Nezve Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ishini yekutumirana mameseji yakachengeteka, ine mitauro yakawanda, iine end-to-end encryption, dudziro ipapo ipapo, uye kufona nezwi/vhidhiyo. Chinangwa chedu: kubatsira vanhu kubatana‚Äîzvakachengeteka, zvakavanzika, uye kuyambuka mitauro.

values.control: <bold>Kutonga:</bold> Mameseji anonyangarika & zviratidzo zvekuti zvaverengwa zvasarudzika.
values.access_aria: Kuwanikwa kune vese: Dudziro otomatiki yemitauro 100+.
values.control_aria: Kutonga: Mameseji anonyangarika uye zviratidzo zvekuti zvaverengwa zvasarudzika.

about.howDescription: Mameseji anovharidzirwa pachishandiso chako asati abuda. Dudziro, mabekapu, uye kuenderanisa midziyo zvakarongwa kuderedza zvatinoona masevha edu.

advertise.title: Shambadza neChatforia
advertise.description: Svika kune vashandisi vane kubatikana nekuratidzwa kwakachengeteka. Tinopa mabhena enzvimbo dzinoonekwa, sponsoshi, uye promos dzemumba. Vanonyorera Premium havasi kuona zviziviso.

adsense.withPubId: Parizvino tiri kushandisa Google AdSense. Kana uchida kutitarisira kuburikidza neGoogle Ads, shandisa publisher ID {{pubId}} uye kukumbira managed placement pane zvikwata zviripazasi. Sponsoshi dzakananga dziripo‚Äîshandisa fomu.
adsense.noPubId: Parizvino tiri kushandisa Google AdSense. Sponsoshi dzakananga dziripowo‚Äîshandisa fomu pazasi.

advertise.noPlacements: Hapana zvigadziko zvaiswa pari zvino. Wedzera mu ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Kudzoka kazhinji uye kugara kwenguva refu muUI yechat
why.brandSafe: Mafomati akachengeteka kubrandi; frequency capping ine ruremekedzo
why.deals: Zvigadzirwa zvakananga kana kuburikidza neAdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ndatenda! Kubvunza kwako kwatumirwa. Tichatevera munguva pfupi.
form.missingRequired: Ndapota zadza zita, email, uye meseji.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvhura mutengi wako weemail kuti utumire kubvunza‚Ä¶

upgrade.title: Kwidza
upgrade.subtitle: Sarudza chirongwa chakakunakira: bvisa zviziviso nePlus, kana uwane maficha ese ane simba nePremium.
upgrade.benefitsLine: Vhura maficha ane simba & bvisa zviziviso.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Pamwedzi)
premiumMonthly.desc: Maficha ese, maringitori, uye zvishandiso zveAI.

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Pagore)
premiumAnnual.disclaimer: Kubhadharwa kumberi. Unogona kumisa chero nguva. Hapana mari yakavanzika.

marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Maficha ese, maringitori, uye zvishandiso zveAI.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: Kubhadharwa kumberi. Unogona kumisa chero nguva. Hapana mari yakavanzika.

gettingStarted.title: Kutanga
gettingStarted.subtitle: Mutsva kuChatforia? Gwaro iri rinokurumidza rinokuratidza zvinokosha kuti ushande mumaminitsi.

alert.text: Gwaro iri richakura patinotanga maficha matsva. Kana paine chatisina, tizivise kuburikidza ne

section2.title: 2) Tanga kutumirana
section2.item1: Gadzira DM kana Boka wo tumira meseji yako yekutanga.
section2.item2: Shandisa dudziro ipapo ipapo kuti utaure mitauro 100+.
section2.item3: Edza mameseji anonyangarika nezviratidzo zvekuti zvaverengwa muProfaira ‚Üí Zvakavanzika.

section3.title: 3) Enda mberi
section3.item2Part1: Batanidza mamwe midziyo uye gadza mabekapu akavharidzirwa mu

account.a: Dhawunirodha app kana shandisa webhu, tinya ‚ÄúGadzira akaunti‚Äù, simbisa email/foni. Kudzorera, shandisa ‚ÄúWakanganganwa pasiwedhi‚Äù.

privacy.a: Ehe. Mameseji nemafoni anovharidzirwa end-to-end pakutanga. Iwe nemugamuchiri chete munogona kuaverenga.

translate.a: Batidza ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù muMarongero ‚Üí Chitarisiko & Mutauro. Tinodudzira pa chishandiso panotsigirwa, kana kuburikidza nemaAPI akachengeteka neruzivo rushoma.

contact.a: Tisvike pa support@chatforia.com. Sanganisira screenshots uye shanduro yeapp yako.

intro.body: Mutemo uyu unotsanangura kuti Chatforia (‚Äúisu‚Äù) inounganidza sei, inoshandisa, uye kugovera ruzivo paunoshandisa maapp nemasevhisi edu. Takagadzira Chatforia kuderedza data ratinogona kuona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ruzivo rwatinounganidza
infoWeCollect.account: Ruzivo rweakaunti (semuenzaniso, email/foni) kugadzira nekuchengetedza akaunti yako.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Zviri mukati zvakavharidzirwa (mameseji/mifoni) ndizvo E2E; hatigoni kuzviverenga.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Crash logs, mhando yechishandiso, kana ongororo diki dzekuvandudza mashandiro.

howWeUse.title: Maitiro atinoshandisa ruzivo
howWeUse.provide: Kupinza neku chengetedza sevhisi (auth, kuona spam/abuse).

sharing.title: Kugovera
sharing.body: Hatisi kutengesa data remunhu. Tinogona kugovera data diki nevashandi (semuenzaniso, push notifications, analytics) pasi pezvibvumirano zvakasimba.

rights.title: Kodzero dzako
rights.body: Zvichienderana nenzvimbo yako (semuenzaniso, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), unogona kukumbira kuwana, kugadzirisa, kudzima, kana kusabvumira mamwe mashandisirwo. Bata: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kuchengetedza data & chengetedzo
retention.body: Tinongoramba tine zvinodiwa kushanda sevhisi uye tinoshandisa kuchengetedzwa kwemaindasitiri. Zviri muE2E hazvigone kuvhurwa nesu.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia haina kuitirwa vana vari pasi pe13 (kana sezvinodiwa nemutemo wenyu).

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tichaisa zvigadziridzo pano uye kugadzirisa zuva re ‚ÄúYakagadziridzwa yekupedzisira‚Äù.

intro.body: Nekushandisa Chatforia unobvuma Mitemo iyi. Kana usingabvumi, usashandise sevhisi.

accounts.title: Maakaunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ipa ruzivo rwakarurama uye chengeta mapasiwedhi akachengeteka.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Une mutoro wezvose zvinoitwa neakaunti yako.

acceptableUse.title: Kushandiswa kunogamuchirika
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Kwete zvirimo zvisiri pamutemo, zvinokuvadza, kana zvinotyora kodzero; hapana spam kana kushungurudzwa kwakarongeka.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tinogona kumisa/kumisa zvachose kana pane kutyora.

yourContent.title: Zviri zvako
yourContent.body: Uchiri kuine kodzero yezviri zvako. Unotipa kodzero dzinodiwa kushanda sevhisi (semuenzaniso, kutumira, kuchengetedza, kududzira).

disclaimer.title: Zvirambidzo & mutoro
disclaimer.body: Sevhisi inopihwa ‚Äúsezvazviri‚Äù pasina vimbiso. Chero zvazvingava, Chatforia haina mutoro wezvikuvadziko zvisiri zvakananga kana zvinotevera, sezvinobvumirwa nemutemo.

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tinogona kugadzirisa mitemo iyi; kuenderera mberi uchishandisa mushure me shanduko zvinoreva kubvuma.

doNotSell.title: Usatengese kana Kugovera Ruzivo Rwangu
doNotSell.body: Chatforia haitengesi ruzivo rwevanhu. Vagari veCalifornia vachiri kukwanisa kuisa zvikumbiro pasi peCPRA vachishandisa bhatani pazasi.

cookies.title: Zvirongwa zveMakuki
cookies.body: Chatforia inoshandisa makuki mashoma (semuenzaniso, session, chengetedzo). Hatisi kushandisa makuki ezviziviso zvebato rechitatu. Tunga makuki kuburikidza nezvirongwa zebhurawuza rako.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Hapana nhamba yakapihwa. Sarudza nearea code kuti utange kutumira meseji.

startChatModal.title: Tanga chat
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Nyora zita, username, foni, kana email‚Ä¶
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Nyora username kana foni wobva wadzvanya Tsvaga.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Nhamba/emaemail zvichawoneka kana wava kuchengetedza sevatauri.

sounds.freeNotice: Uri paFree ‚Äî manzwi ePremium anoonekwa asi akavharwa. Kwidza kuti uvhure ese.

aiSettings.title: Marongero eAI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Dzora dudziro, mhinduro dzekukurumidza, uye mhinduro dzaForiaBot otomatiki.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Tumira mameseji ekupedzisira (akacheneswa) kuAI kuti ipa mhinduro dzekukurumidza.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Kana zvabatidzwa, mazwi akaflagwa anodzoserwa neAI akavanzwa
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Batidza kupindura otomatiki kana ndiri kubatikana

accessibilitySettings.title: Kuwanikwa & Zviziviso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Sarudzo dzekuita kuti Chatforia iite nyore pasina kutsamira paruzha.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Inotanga payakajairwa. Wedzera kana uchida mavara makuru muwanikwa.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Zviratidzo zvinoonekwa zvemeseji & mafoni
Ratidza mabhena uye kupenya kwezita kuitira kuti urege kupotsa chiitiko.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Zunza pameseji itsva (kana zvichitsigirwa)
Batidza kuzunza kwechishandiso nezviziviso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Penyeza skrini pafoni inopinda
Kupenya kupfupi kana foni ichirira.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Dudzira otomatiki voice notes
Namira dudziro pama audio aunogamuchira.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Ratidza mabhena uye kupenya kwezita kuti urege kupotsa chiitiko.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Chengetedza ciphertext chete kusevha. Inodzima AI/Dudziro uye pre-views dzekuongorora.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Tsvaga nezita remadunhurirwa, zita, username, kana foni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Goverana ne link yekukoka kuti mutange kukurukura ipapo.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Ramba uri pedyo neChatforia pa iOS neAndroid.
peoplePage.syncTip: Zano: Mameseji ako anoramba aenderana pawebhu nepa mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Sangana nemunhu mutsva ipapo. Tichakubatanidzai tovhura imba yenguva shoma.

login.title: Makadii kudzoka
login.subtitle: Pinda muakaunti yako yeChatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: Single-sign-on haripo pari zvino. Shandisa zita remushandisi & pasiwedhi.

error.invalid: Zita remushandisi kana pasiwedhi hazvina kunaka
error.unprocessable: Chikumbiro chisiri pamutemo. Tarisa zita remushandisi/email uye pasiwedhi.
error.deviceLimit: Magetsi akasvika muganhu weFree. Buda pane chimwe chishandiso kana kwidza kuPremium kuti ubatanidze mimwe midziyo.
